Key Match Events: Jackson Chourio hit a game-tying home run in the bottom of the 8th inning
Garrett Mitchell followed with a two-run home run to give the Brewers the lead
Devin Williams closed out the game in the top of the 9th
Post-Match Reflections: Mets fans expressed disappointment and frustration on social media
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mets had multiple opportunities to score but failed to capitalize
Others: The Mets lost Game 2 of the playoffs to the Brewers, forcing a Game 3 on Thursday
